speaker: Slug
dialog: WOW, this shop is huge!

speaker: Rick
dialog: Don't get lost, you have four aisles to pick groceries from.

speaker: Rick
dialog: Let me explain the what is what first.

speaker: Rick
dialog: The biggest play area on the left is the actual shop,

speaker: Rick
dialog: You can click the tabs on the top to go anywhere you want to in real game.

speaker: Rick
dialog: If you get lost, I will sell you out here, and you will become dinner on these people's dish

speaker: Slug
dialog: No Rick, you can't do this, I don't want to poison these people.

speaker: Slug
dialog: What can I do with those potatoes?

speaker: Rick
dialog: Why you always ask these obvious questions, you need to check the quality and pick as you did everyday

speaker: Rick
dialog: Now listen to me. Try right-click to check each potato's quality

speaker: Rick
dialog: and then use left-click to buy

speaker: Slug
dialog: These potatoes look nice, I will buy all of them. ouch! why my camera is shaking

speaker: Rick
dialog: That means you don't have enough money you dumbass, bad quality and good quality have the same price

speaker: Rick
dialog: So be cautious when you choose your groceries

speaker: Rick
dialog: Once you pick them, they will be added to the basket, the bottom right area.

speaker: Slug
dialog: But what does this big order thing does

speaker: Rick
dialog: It's order menu for those people who want higher points, I will explain it later

speaker: Rick
dialog: Also, you will get bonus points, if you spend almost all budget in shopping

speaker: Rick
dialog: Hurry up Slug, my stomach is growling let's head to another stage

speaker: Slug
dialog: Ok man, Let me move my mouse to the basket to check out
